servinfo.title: Engine noise – Connecting rod noise
servinfo.ptxt: Perform troubleshooting referring to the followings when ECM has detected no DTC and no abnormality has been found in Visual Inspection:M16A and J20A and Engine Basic Inspection:M16A and J20A .

attention3.ptxt: Before checking mechanical noise, make sure that:

ps.ptxt: Worn piston, ring and cylinder bore

action.ptxt: Pistons, Piston Rings, Connecting Rods and Cylinders Inspection and Cleaning:J20A or Cylinders, Pistons and Piston Rings Inspection:M16A
Pistons, Piston Rings, Connecting Rods and Cylinders Inspection and Cleaning:J20A or Crank Pin and Connecting Rod Bearings Inspection:M16A
Pistons, Piston Rings, Connecting Rods and Cylinders Inspection and Cleaning:J20A or Crank Pin and Connecting Rod Bearings Inspection:M16A
Pistons, Piston Rings, Connecting Rods and Cylinders Removal and Installation:J20A or Pistons, Piston Rings, Connecting Rods and Cylinders Removal and Installation:M16A
